metadata.name: TSV1 #1 - Venice, CA
metadata.description:
Shot #1 was taken in Venice, California, on August 9th, 2019. 

Taking Shots Volume 1 is the first drop in a limited volume Photographic NFT series of 1 of 1s by Viktor Bezic. Utilizing compositional techniques that turn basketball courts into monuments, it celebrates the sport's simple and inexpensive equipment: an iron ring and a round ball. These lowly tools have become the stuff of dreams for generations.

attributes.value: Taking Shots Volume 1 is the first drop in a limited volume Photographic NFT series of 1 of 1s by Viktor Bezic. Utilizing compositional techniques that turn basketball courts into monuments, it celebrates the sport's simple and inexpensive equipment: an iron ring and a round ball. These lowly tools have become the stuff of dreams for generations. Viktor's work was previously featured by Nike, Footlocker, House of Hoops, Local Hoops and SLAM.
